General.Name: CLEANTEK Industries Inc
General.Description: Cleantek Industries Inc. imagines, designs, patents, manufactures, and markets technology-based equipment for oil and gas, and construction industries in Western Canada and the United States. Its products include ZeroE, a dehydration technology for the treatment and vaporization of produced water at the point of collection; Halo, a crown-mounted lighting system; DZeroE, a wastewater dehydration system; SolarHybrid.Li light tower, an off-grid system; SolarHybrid light towers; Stadium Lighting, a LED tower lighting product; Securetek, a site security and surveillance products; Dualtek, a dual engine light tower; and CleanSteam, a wastewater dehydration system. The company is also involved in renting lighting and dehydration equipment. Cleantek Industries Inc. is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 500, 4th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 2V6
